citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:02 PM on 19-April-
2023.
Inspectors knocked on the door, called the phone number on file, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before
departing.
Additional Inspectors:
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:02 PM on 19-April-
2023. 
 
Inspectors knocked on the door, called the phone number on file, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before 
departing. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
